features.name: User Model
features.description: Defines the user entity, including profile, privacy, and GDPR fields.

features.name: Moment Model
features.description: Defines moments (posts) with media, privacy, and relationships.

features.name: Comment Model
features.description: Defines comments and nested replies for moments.

features.name: Reaction Model
features.description: Defines reactions to moments and comments.

features.name: FriendRequest Model
features.description: Handles friend request logic and status.

features.name: Community Model
features.description: Defines communities, their types, and members.

features.name: Event Model
features.description: Defines events, attendees, and related community.

features.name: Location Model
features.description: Defines locations for moments and events.

features.name: AuthenticationManager
features.description: Handles user authentication, onboarding, and biometric login.

features.name: DependencyContainer
features.description: Dependency injection for all services and managers.

features.name: AnalyticsManager
features.description: Tracks analytics events and user actions.

features.name: MediaProcessingService
features.description: Handles media processing for images and videos.

features.name: UserDiscoveryService
features.description: Implements user discovery and search logic.

features.name: FeedAlgorithmService
features.description: Personalizes and sorts the feed for each user.

features.name: SocialConnectionService
features.description: Manages friend requests and social connections.

features.name: MomentCreationService
features.description: Handles creation of new moments with media and privacy.

features.name: NotificationService
features.description: Handles push notifications and in-app notifications.

features.name: Views
features.description: All SwiftUI views for onboarding, feed, discovery, profile, notifications, comments, and moment creation.

features.name: Camera Integration
features.description: Custom camera view for capturing media.

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Centralized error types for the app.
